00035 bool RYellowPages::newHost( Network::NetProtocol socket, const std::string& name, const Network::SocketAddress &address ) {
00036     
00037     std::pair< std::map< std::string, Network::SocketAddress >::iterator, bool > insert_result =
00038         hosts[socket].insert( std::pair< std::string, Network::SocketAddress >( name, address ) );
00039     
00040     return insert_result.second;
00041 }
00042 
00043 bool RYellowPages::eraseHost( Network::NetProtocol socket, const std::string& name ) {
00044     return hosts[socket].erase( name );
00045 }
00046 
00047 bool RYellowPages::loadFromFile(const std::string& nomefile)
00048 {   
00049     ifstream ifs( nomefile.c_str() );
00050     if ( !ifs.is_open() )  {
00051         RDK_ERROR_STREAM( "File " << nomefile << " not found, unable to load RYellowPages data" );
00052         return false;
00053     }
00054     
00055     string name, socket, host;
00056     
00057     int port;
00058     
00059     while ( ifs >> name >> socket >> host >> port ) {
00060         if (name.size() > 0 && name[0] != '#') {
00061             try {
00062                 Network::NetProtocol socketType = Network::stringToNetProtocol(socket);
00063                 hosts[socketType].insert(make_pair(name, Network::InetAddress(host, (unsigned short) port)));
00064 /*              if ( socket == "UDP_IP" )
00065                     hosts[Network::UDP_IP].insert(
00066                         std::pair< std::string, Network::SocketAddress >(
00067                             name,
00068                             Network::InetAddress( host, (unsigned short)port ) ) );
00069                 if ( socket == "TCP_IP" )
00070                     hosts[Network::TCP_IP].insert(
00071                         std::pair< std::string, Network::SocketAddress >(
00072                             name,
00073                             Network::InetAddress( host, (unsigned short)port ) ) );
00074                 }*/
00075             }
00076             catch ( Network::NetException& exc ) {
00077                 RDK_ERROR_STREAM( "Error on insert for: " << name << " "
00078                     << socket << " " << host << " " << port );
00079                 RDK_ERROR_STREAM( "Exception: " << exc.fullwhat() );
00080             }
00081         }
00082         ifs.ignore ( INT_MAX, '\n' );
00083     }
00084     
00085     int elements = 0;
00086     for ( std::map<Network::NetProtocol,std::map<std::string,Network::SocketAddress> >::iterator typeIter=hosts.begin();
00087         typeIter != hosts.end();
00088         typeIter++ )
00089         elements += typeIter->second.size();
00090     
00091     RDK_INFO_STREAM("Loaded YellowPages from files ( " << elements << " elements )");
00092     return true;
00093 }
00094 
00095 bool RYellowPages::getSocketAddress(    Network::NetProtocol socket,
00096                     const std::string& name,
00097                     Network::SocketAddress &address ) const {
00098     std::map< Network::NetProtocol, std::map< std::string, Network::SocketAddress > >::const_iterator
00099         socketFind = hosts.find( socket );
00100     if ( socketFind != hosts.end() ) {
00101         std::map< std::string, Network::SocketAddress >::const_iterator find_result = socketFind->second.find( name );
00102         if ( find_result != socketFind->second.end() ) {
00103             address = find_result->second;
00104             return true;
00105         }
00106     }
00107     return false;
00108 }
00109 
00110 const std::map< Network::NetProtocol, std::map< std::string, Network::SocketAddress > >& RYellowPages::getMap() const {
00111     return hosts;
00112 }
